frontmatter.name: Igor Mikhailovich Dobrolyubov
frontmatter.vita: Belarusian Soviet film director, actor, teacher and screenwriter, National Artist of the Byelorussian SSR (1985). Member of the CPSU since 1963

timelineData.text: Graduated from the Faculty of Journalism of the Belarusian State University..
Actor of the Belarusian Republican Youth Theater.
All-Russian State Institute of Cinematography named after Gerasimov (workshop of Mikhail Romm).
Secretary of the Board of the Union of Cinematographers of the BSSR.
Professor of the Institute of Modern Knowledge named A.Shirokov (Minsk).

work.title: Schedule for the day after tomorrow
